originalText.text: I do lessons mainly with Dr.Felix, one of the instructors, and he is absolutely amazing along with all the other instructors. They are responsive to needs, prompt with scheduling and reminders, and professional in all aspect. I had a lot of anxiety about initially starting singing lessons, and while I am still working to improve, I definitely have love Dr.Felix patience, his ability to break concepts down to things that I understand, and just the level of comfort he encourages while learning. Also love Ellie too as I had lessons with her before! And just all around high praises for the entire team.

originalText.text: I absolutely love singing with Ellie! I have no prior musical background and Ellie worked with me on making some quick improvements and helped me establish a foundation to become a better singer. She breaks down concepts in ways I can understand and lessons help me build my vocal skills. The results were quick! I still have a long ways to go, but Ellie is a patient and steady teacher. I highly recommend!

I highly recommend!

originalText.text:
I've been working with Josaphat for a while now and have to say he's incredible. I started with no singing experience and sounded awful, but now I think I can hold my own. Improvement was quick and noticeable, and I feel like I get better with every lesson.

I can tell that Josaphat tailors his approach to each student, is incredibly knowledgeable, and always has a reason for asking you to do something, even if you don't know what it is. He worked  hard to create an environment of mutual respect, which allows him to deliver feedback in a really effective way and accelerate the learning process.

Could not recommend working with Josaphat enough!

text.text:

originalText.text: Ellie is so helpful and encouraging! I've been working with her for many years (in multiple cities!) and she has completely re-shaped the way I approach using my voice. My range, tone, and power has improved, and I feel much safer in terms of avoiding strain. Ellie also really pushes me to consider new things and next steps technically and professionally that I wouldn't on my own. I'm really learning what my voice can do and Ellie makes me excited to keep exploring that. I confidently recommend Singing Lessons NYC for anyone who is looking to work on their singing at any level!

originalText.text:
I've taken singing lessons in NYC for almost a year now, and it's been a blast! Ellie is an incredible teacher. She is very kind, bright, caring, funny and professional.  In less than a year I have seen a tremendous improvement in my singing ability.

In addition to singing, Ellie helped me develop the tools for my own artistry by teaching me piano, music theory and pop songwriting.  Ellie is versatile and open to many different genres of music. I can't express how happy I am to have the support of Ellie as a teacher. I went from being a shy, reserved guy to someone who can't go a day without belting out a tune. Ellie is the real deal!
